info.title: TripPlanner API
info.description: Complete REST API for TripPlanner backend with NAVER Cloud Platform integration

get.summary: Redirect to Google OAuth login page
get.description: Redirect to Google OAuth page

get.summary: Handle Google OAuth callback and create/login user
get.description: Handle Google OAuth callback

get.summary: List checklist items for authenticated user
get.description: Display a listing of the resource.

200.description: List of checklist items ordered by newest first

post.summary: Create a checklist item for a trip
post.description: Store a newly created resource in storage.

201.description: Checklist item created successfully (default is_checked: false)

get.description: Display the specified resource.

200.description: Checklist item details with trip relationship

delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

patch.summary: Update checklist item content or toggle checked status (owner only)
patch.description: Update the specified resource in storage.

get.description: Display a listing of the checkpoint images.

200.description: List of checkpoint images ordered by uploaded_at desc

post.summary: Upload an image to a checkpoint with NAVER Green-Eye moderation (trip owner only)
post.description: Uploads image with automatic content moderation for adult content and violence

image.description: Image file (jpeg, jpg, png, gif, webp, max 10MB)

get.description: Display the specified checkpoint image.

200.description: Image details with checkpoint and user relationships

delete.summary: Delete checkpoint image (uploader or trip owner)
delete.description: Remove the checkpoint image and delete the file.

204.description: Image deleted successfully (file and database record)

get.summary: List comments with filtering by entity type and ID
get.description: Display a listing of the resource.

200.description: List of comments with user and entity relationships

post.summary: Create a comment on a trip, checkpoint, or diary with optional images
post.description: Creates a comment with automatic NAVER Green-Eye content moderation for uploaded images

entity_type.description: Type of entity being commented on

entity_id.description: ID of the entity being commented on

content.example: Great trip! Loved visiting this place.

get.description: Display the specified resource.

200.description: Comment details with user and entity relationships

delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

patch.description: Update the specified resource in storage.

get.description: Display a listing of the user's favorites.

200.description: List of user's favorites with favoritable relationships

post.summary: Add a favorite (place, trip, or checkpoint)
post.description: Store a newly created favorite.

get.description: Display the specified favorite.

post.summary: Search for hotels by city, geocode, or hotel IDs
post.description: Search for hotels by city, geocode, or hotel IDs.

post.summary: Search for hotel offers with availability and pricing
post.description: Search for hotel offers (availability and pricing).

200.description: Hotel offers with availability and pricing

get.summary: Get hotel offer details by offer ID
get.description: Get hotel offer details by offer ID.

post.summary: Get hotel ratings and sentiments
post.description: Get hotel ratings and sentiments.

post.summary: Create a hotel booking
post.description: Create a hotel booking.

post.summary: Search hotels with offers in one call
post.description: Search hotels with offers in one call (combined search).

get.summary: List itinerary items with day/time ordering
get.description: Display a listing of the resource.

200.description: List of itinerary items ordered by day_number and start_time

post.summary: Create an itinerary item for a trip (trip owner only)
post.description: Store a newly created resource in storage.

get.description: Display the specified resource.

200.description: Itinerary item details with trip and place relationships

delete.summary: Delete an itinerary item (trip owner only)
delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

patch.description: Update the specified resource in storage.

get.description: Display a listing of checkpoints.

post.summary: Create a new checkpoint
post.description: Store a newly created checkpoint.

get.description: Display the specified checkpoint.

post.summary: Convert address to coordinates (Geocoding)
post.description: Uses NAVER Maps Geocoding API to convert an address or place name to latitude/longitude coordinates

query.description: Address or place name in Korean or English

post.summary: Convert coordinates to address (Reverse Geocoding)
post.description: Uses NAVER Maps Reverse Geocoding API to convert latitude/longitude to a human-readable address

post.summary: Get driving directions between two points
post.description: Uses NAVER Maps Directions 5 API to calculate optimal driving route. Supports 5 different route options.

option.description: Route option: trafast (traffic-aware fast), traoptimal (optimal), tracomfort (comfort), traavoidtoll (avoid tolls), traavoidcaronly (avoid car-only roads)

path.description: Array of [longitude, latitude] coordinates for the route

post.summary: Get driving directions with up to 15 waypoints
post.description: Uses NAVER Maps Directions 15 API to calculate optimal driving route through multiple waypoints. Supports up to 15 intermediate stops.

waypoints.description: Array of waypoint objects with lat and lng properties (max 15)

path.description: Array of [longitude, latitude] coordinates for the entire route

get.description: Display a listing of user's notifications.

parameters.name: unread
parameters.description: Filter by read status (1=unread only, 0=read only)

200.description: List of notifications ordered by created_at desc

get.summary: Get count of unread notifications for user
get.description: Get unread notification count.
Display the specified notification.

patch.summary: Mark a notification as read (owner only)
patch.description: Mark a single notification as read.

post.summary: Mark all notifications as read for authenticated user
post.description: Mark all user's notifications as read.

post.summary: Search for places by text query
post.description: Search for places using text query.

post.summary: Search for places near specific coordinates
post.description: Search for nearby places by coordinates.

200.description: Nearby places from NAVER Local Search

get.summary: Get place details by NAVER place ID
get.description: Get place details by NAVER place ID.

get.summary: List all saved places from database
get.description: Display a listing of saved places.

200.description: List of saved places with reviews

post.summary: Save a place from NAVER to database
post.description: Store a place from NAVER to database.

fetch_details.description: Fetch full details from NAVER (default: false)

name.description: Used only if fetch_details is false

latitude.description: Used only if fetch_details is false

longitude.description: Used only if fetch_details is false

get.summary: View a saved place with reviews and favorites
get.description: Display the specified place from database.
Display a listing of reviews.

post.summary: Create a review for a place or checkpoint with optional images
post.description: Creates a review with automatic NAVER Green-Eye content moderation for uploaded images

reviewable_id.description: ID of the entity being reviewed

get.description: Display the specified review.

post.summary: Get keyword search trends over time
post.description: Analyze search volume trends for one or more keywords with optional demographic and device filters

keywords.description: Array of keywords to analyze (max 20 keywords)

device.description: Device filter: empty string or omit = all devices, 'pc' = PC only, 'mo' = mobile only

post.summary: Compare multiple keyword groups
post.description: Compare search trends for up to 5 different keyword groups simultaneously

data.description: Comparison results for all keyword groups

post.summary: Get age and gender demographic trends
post.description: Analyze search trends broken down by age groups and gender

post.summary: Get device usage trends
post.description: Analyze search trends broken down by device type (mobile vs PC)

post.summary: Analyze travel destination popularity
post.description: Analyze destination search trends with peak period detection

post.summary: Get seasonal travel insights
post.description: Analyze seasonal patterns with summer/winter peak detection

get.summary: List share links for a trip (trip owner only)
get.description: Display a listing of shares for a trip.

200.description: List of share links with auto-generated tokens

post.summary: Create a share link for a trip (trip owner only)
post.description: Store a newly created share in storage.

201.description: Share link created with auto-generated 32-character token

get.summary: Access a shared trip via token (public endpoint)
get.description: Display the trip via share token.

200.description: Trip details accessible via share link

delete.description: Remove the specified share from storage.

get.description: List all tags with optional search and sort.

get.summary: List popular tags by usage count
get.description: List popular tags by usage count.

parameters.name: min_count
parameters.description: Minimum usage count to filter tags (default: 10)

200.description: List of popular tags with pagination

get.description: Display a single tag.

post.summary: Attach a tag to an entity (trip, place, or checkpoint)
post.description: Attach a tag to an entity (trip, place, or checkpoint).

422.description: Validation error or tag already attached

message.example: Tag is already attached to this entity

delete.summary: Detach a tag from an entity
delete.description: Detach a tag from an entity.

post.summary: Translate text using NAVER Papago
post.description: Translate text using Papago

source_language.description: Source language code (optional: auto-detect if omitted)

post.summary: Translate image text using NAVER Papago Image Translation (OCR + Translation in one call)
post.description: Translate image using Papago Image Translation API (RECOMMENDED)

post.summary: Extract text from image and translate using NAVER Clova OCR + Papago (Legacy)
post.description: Extract text from image via OCR and translate (Legacy - use /image instead)

post.summary: Transcribe audio and translate using NAVER Clova Speech + Papago
post.description: Transcribe speech to text and translate

get.description: List user's translations with optional filters
View a single translation

delete.description: Delete a translation and its file (if any)

get.description: Display a listing of the user's trips.

post.summary: Create a new trip
post.description: Store a newly created trip.

get.description: Display the specified trip.

get.summary: List diary entries for authenticated user
get.description: Display a listing of the resource.

200.description: List of diary entries ordered by date (newest first)

post.summary: Create a diary entry for a trip
post.description: Store a newly created resource in storage.

text.example: Today we visited the Tokyo Tower. The view was amazing!

get.description: Display the specified resource.

200.description: Diary entry details with trip and user relationships

delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

patch.summary: Update diary entry text or mood (owner only)
patch.description: Update the specified resource in storage.

get.description: Display a listing of the resource.

200.description: List of trip participants with user relationships

post.summary: Invite a participant to a trip (owner only)
post.description: Store a newly created resource in storage.

get.description: Display the specified resource.

delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

patch.description: Update the specified resource in storage.
